The Product Development Lifecycle

An interactive guide to the Limi Lighting EPDP. Click any phase or decision gate to explore details. This process is mandatory for all new product development and significant updates.

Phase 1

Concept & Feasibility

Define Vision & Validate Idea

DG1
Phase 2

Detailed Design & Low-Fi Proto

Develop & Test Concept

DG2
Phase 3

Refined Design & Hi-Fi Proto

Finalize & Prove Design (PPDP)

DG3
Phase 4

Sourcing & External Samples

Supplier Engagement (Purchasing)

DG4
Phase 5

Trial Production & Validation

Prove Production Process

DG5
Phase 6

Mass Production Launch

Scale & Monitor

Phase 7

Post-Launch & Improvement

Learn & Iterate

Select a phase above to see details.

RACI Matrix

The RACI matrix defines roles and responsibilities across the EPDP process:
Responsible (R) - Does the work|Accountable (A) - Approves the work|Consulted (C) - Provides input|Informed (I) - Kept updated

ActivityProduct Manager (Umer)Lead Engineer (Mark)Design Engineer(s)Purchasing LeadProduction LeadQC LeadAdmin Lead (Cherry/Karen)
Product Brief Creation (1.1)ARCIIII
Product Brief Clarification Doc (1.1)RCIIIIR
Preliminary Research & Ideation (1.2)CARIIII
Conceptual Designs (1.3)CARIIII
Concept Review & Selection (1.4)ARCIIIC
DG1 Approval (Concept)ARCIIIC
Detailed 3D CAD (2.1)IARIIII
Initial 2D Drawings (2.1)IARIIII
Preliminary BOM (2.1)IARCIII
Low-Fi Prototyping Plan (2.2)CARIIII
Low-Fi Prototype Creation & Iteration (2.3)CARIICI
Internal DFM/DFA Review (part of 2.3)CARCCCI
Low-Fi Prototype Review (2.4)ARCIIIC
DG2 Approval (Design Freeze)ARCIIIC
Refine Design to V1.0 (CAD, 2D, BOM) (3.1)CARIICI
Material Selection for Hi-Fi Proto (3.1)CARCIII
Hi-Fi Prototyping Plan (3.2)CARIIII
Hi-Fi Prototype Creation & Testing (3.3)CARICRI
DFM/DFA Review & Report (3.4)CARCCCI
Create Pre-Production Design Package (PPDP) (3.5)CARICCR
DG3 Approval (PPDP Handoff)ARCCCCC
PPDP Review by Purchasing (4.1)ICIAIII
Supplier Identification & Shortlisting (4.2)ICIAIII
RFQ Package Prep & Send (Samples) (4.3)ICIAIII
Quotation Analysis & Supplier Selection (Samples) (4.4)ACIRICI
Sample PO Placement & Financial Approval (4.5)AIIRIIC
Sample Production Follow-Up (4.6)IIIAIII
Sample Reception & Initial Verification (4.7)ICIRICI
External Sample Evaluation & Testing (EPDVP 5.1-5.2)CRCCIAI
Golden Sample Approval & Documentation (EPDVP 5.4)ARICCRC
DG4 Approval (External Samples Validated)ARICICC
Trial Production Planning (6.1)CCICACI
Order Components for Trial Run (6.1)CIIACII
Pre-Trial Briefing & Setup (6.2)ICIIACI
Execute Trial Production & Monitor (6.3)CCIIARI
Post-Trial Review & Analysis (6.4)ARICRRC
Finalize Production Documentation (SOPs, QC etc.) (6.5)IACIRAC
Create Final Production Package (6.5)IARICCR
DG5 Approval (Readiness for Mass Production)ARICRCC
FMPR Preparation (7.1)ICICARI
FMPR Execution & Monitoring (7.2)CRICARI
Post-FMPR Review & Stabilization (7.3)ARICRRC
Ongoing Mass Production & Monitoring (7.4)IIICARI
Data Collection & Analysis (All Depts) (8.1)CRIRRRA
Periodic Post-Launch Review Meetings (8.2)ARICCCC
Implementing Improvements (Assigned Leads) (8.3)ACCCCCR
Lessons Learned & Knowledge Base Update (8.4)RACIIIC
